text: tum kabhee bhee usamen khade na hona. vah masjid jisakee aadhaarashila pahale din hee se eeshaparaayanata par rakhee gaee hai, vah isakee zyaada haqadaar hai ki tum usamen khade ho. usamen aise log pae jaate hain, jo achchhee tarah svachchh rahana pasand karate hai, aur allaah bhee paak-saaf rahanevaalon ko pasand karata hai
